constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 167, Number 201 (Thursday, November 18, 2021)]
[House]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Mr. COURTNEY:
H.R. 6024.
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
Article 1, Section 8
By Ms. DeLAURO.
H.R. 6025.
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
Article I of the United States Constitution and its
subsequent amendments, and further clarified and interpreted
by the Supreme Court of the United States.
[Page H6609]

latestAction.text: Referred to the House Committee on Education and Labor.

title: Work Act
